import React, {Component} from 'react' import {access} from '../index.js' import Sfondo1 from '../Images/SfondoIniziale.jpg'; import { io, Socket } from 'socket.io-client' export const socket = io('http://localhost:3001',{transports: ['websocket', 'polling', 'flashsocket'], "credentials":true}) export class LoginPage extends Component { state = { visibility: "hidden", access: "login" } switchAccess(){ if (this.state.visibility === "hidden") this.setState({visibility:"visible", access:"signup"}) else this.setState({visibility:"hidden", access:"login"}) } render(){ return ( <>
